task.name: TalkToALPHA
task.description: Talk to ALPHA to get information about your current time period.

task.name: JGForge
task.description: Find Johannes Gutenberg at his forge.

task.name: TalkToJG
task.description: Talk to Johannes Gutenberg to get an idea of who he was and what he did.

task.name: FindSK
task.description: Find the shopkeeper in the Shop in town.

task.name: TalkToSK
task.description: Talk to the shopkeeper and retrieve the Master of Playing Cards copper plate from her.

task.name: ReturnToJG
task.description: Return the copper plate to Johannes Gutenberg at his forge.

task.name: GoToBank
task.description: Find Johann Fust at the bank in town.

task.name: TalkToJF
task.description: Give the printed playing cards to Johann Fust to secure a loan for Johannes Gutenberg.

task.name: FinishJG
task.description: Tell Johannes Gutenberg the good news about the loan.

task.name: GoToLib
task.description: Go to the library just north of Gutenberg's forge.

task.name: TalkToLB
task.description: Ask the Librarian about information about research publications.

task.name: Leave
task.description: Talk to ALPHA to travel to the next time period.
